channel.title: [Delta] Need help adding in following pets
channel.description:
I've spent the last three days looking at various tutorials(including Marcbob's), and none of them seem to work, be it that they're too source specific, or just too outdated for me to convert to Delta. If it's important, the specific source is the newest PkPlanet.
Does anyone know of any tutorials they can point me to? Or better yet, have their own method I can use?

item.title: [Delta] Need help adding in following pets
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

I was converting summoning tutorials before, but to no avail. QQ the best I have managed to do is make npcs follow players, but they’re far from functional as pets.
Also: I’ll remember about the rsgp thing.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help adding in following pets

item.title: [Delta] Need help adding in following pets
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“darthbonsly, post:1, topic:453999”]I’ve spent the last three days looking at various tutorials(including Marcbob’s), and none of them seem to work, be it that they’re too source specific, or just too outdated for me to convert to Delta.
If it’s important, the specific source is the newest PkPlanet.

Does anyone know of any tutorials they can point me to? Or better yet, have their own method I can use?
If you want payment I have a fair bit of rsgp, not doing something insane like giving 40m though.[/quote]
All help on this forum is for free. You cannot charge any form of payment or give any form of payment.
And I don’t think that anyone have added this in delta or he did but he haven’t and maybe won’t release.
I don’t know if it will help you but take a look at your player following system. Maybe that make some things clear.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help adding in following pets
